Title: Against Overwhelming Odds
Description:
Though you puny mortals have come to a truce, I have heard rumor that some of you still harbor grudges.

If you gather some friends, I know a place you can show the other side who is truly superior.

And to make it interesting, if you are successful I have a prize for you.
ObjectivesText: Slay 25 Level 70 Horde anywhere within the Dragon Isles.
